delegateVoteButtons.instructions-1: CY: Please note that you are voting as a delegate. Your vote wil be public.
delegateVoteButtons.instructions-2: CY: To switch to voting as an individual, click the 'Roles' menu.
delegateVoteButtons.reason-message: CY: Give a brief (optional) reason for your choice. This will be visible to your supporters.
delegateVoteButtons.delegateVotingClosed: CY: Voting for this proposal has closed for delegates. Delegate voting closes two weeks before the proposal's expiry date.
